caseStudies.title: Concrete Forensics: Diagnosing Failure in Plain Sight
caseStudies.summary: A residential structural failure investigation where Echelon Foundry used the Diagnostic Framework to uncover curing, slope, and workmanship pathologies hidden behind visible surface defects.
caseStudies.outcome: Root causes identified before destructive testing; remediation and verification plan aligned with ASTM standards.

caseStudies.title: Financial Platform Diagnostic: Rebuilding Trust Through Systemic Clarity
caseStudies.summary: A fintech-scale audit that revealed systemic control gaps in data lineage and reconciliation, restoring financial accuracy and compliance confidence through architectural and process alignment.
caseStudies.outcome: Reconciliation times reduced 80%; systemic control and investor confidence restored.

caseStudies.title: Organizational Throughput Diagnostic: Restoring Flow in a High-Complexity Environment
caseStudies.summary: An enterprise engineering analysis that identified architectural and cultural feedback loops throttling throughput, leading to a data-driven reorganization and measurable flow recovery.
caseStudies.outcome: Deployment frequency doubled; unplanned work reduced 50%; morale and engagement metrics improved.

caseStudies.title: Investment Due Diligence: Integrating Technical Reality With Financial Outcomes
caseStudies.summary: A combined financial and technical due-diligence engagement where Echelon Foundry evaluated a high-velocity fintech platform, uncovering material architectural and operational risks and guiding capital allocation toward a stronger medical-sector opportunity.
caseStudies.outcome: Investment preserved and reallocated; risk-adjusted returns improved by avoiding a high-risk fintech position and directing capital to a higher-performing medical opportunity.
